const openBlock = (e) => { let block = e.target.parentNode console.log(block.classList) if(block.classList.contains('open')) block.classList.remove('open') else block.classList.add('open') } function ProductDropdown(props) { return(
{ props.product.description }
{ props.product.details }
{ props.product.model }
) } export default ProductDropdown
